mapper.select: SELECT A.PK_QUESTION_SEQ AS pkQuestionSeq , A.TYPE AS type , A.LEVEL AS level , A.QUESTION AS questionName , A.SOLUTION AS solution , A.REGIST_ID AS registId , A.UPDATE_ID AS updateId , A.UPDATE_DT AS updateDt , B.PK_QUSITION_RESULT_SEQ AS pkQusitionResultSeq , B.PK_USER_SEQ AS pkUserSeq FROM AI_QUESTION A INNER JOIN AI_QUESTION_RESULT B ON A.PK_QUESTION_SEQ = B.PK_QUESTION_SEQ WHERE B.PK_USER_SEQ = #{pkUserSeq}

SELECT A.PK_QUESTION_SEQ AS pkQuestionSeq , A.TYPE AS type , A.QUESTION AS questionName , A.SOLUTION AS solution , A.SUMMARY AS summary , A.TITLE AS title , A.PASSAGE AS passage , A.URL AS url , A.SOLUTION AS solution , A.REGIST_ID AS registId , A.UPDATE_ID AS updateId , A.UPDATE_DT AS updateDt FROM AI_QUESTION A WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY A.PK_QUESTION_SEQ ASC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

SELECT A.PK_QUESTION_SEQ AS pkQuestionSeq , A.TYPE AS type , A.QUESTION AS questionName , A.SOLUTION AS solution , A.SUMMARY AS summary , A.TITLE AS title , A.PASSAGE AS passage , A.URL AS url , A.SOLUTION AS solution , A.REGIST_ID AS registId , A.UPDATE_ID AS updateId , A.UPDATE_DT AS updateDt FROM AI_QUESTION A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PK_QUESTION_SEQ = #{pkQuestionSeq} ORDER BY A.PK_QUESTION_SEQ ASC
